callback_utils¶

Functions¶

def getNodesCreatedBy()

Description¶

Install callbacks in Maya.

msTools.core.maya.callback_utils.getNodesCreatedBy(callable_, *args, **kwargs)¶

Listen for nodes created during the execution of a callable.

Parameters:
  • callable_ (callable[[*args, **kwargs], any]) – Callable to execute. Must be compatible with *args and **kwargs.
  • *args – Positional arguments used to invoke callable_.
  • **kwargs – Keyword arguments used to invoke callable_.
Other Parameters:
 

listenTo (basestring, optional) – Filter specifying which node types to listen for. Defaults to 'dependNode'.
Returns:(list [OpenMaya.MObject], any) – A two-element tuple.
  1. Pointers to the dependency nodes created during the execution of callable_.
  2. Return value of callable_.
